评论详情: This backpack purse has been great! It's sturdy, durable, and huge inside pockets. You can adjust the straps. The color is beautiful. No issues with zippers breaking or straps breaking. Im super impressed and will most likely be buying another one when I need to replace mine.

So I did return this bag only because I decided to go with a smaller backpack style version. This bag is beautiful, made well, fully lined, seems sturdy, and comfortable. I really did go back and forth and almost kept both bags but ultimately decided to return this solely based on its size. I was primarily looking for a personal item to carry on a plane and this was close to being perfect just went with a different one from the same company. Still highly recommend

I like the bag a lot, it’s good quality, lots of compartments. To organize your contents.  The only issue I have is the straps, they constantly slip down, the buckles really do not help them to stay adjusted where you need them to.

I like that I could use all the pockets for things that I know that I might need.  Spacious great material.  Would buy it again if nneded.

This backpack is cute, looks like a purse style bag, and has lots of storage!  I love that it’s on the smaller end so it’s easy to carry and fits well in my stroller

Needed a new carry-on. Very happy with this bag! 4 flights, 2 ferry rides and it held up perfectly. Great quality. I packed a lot into this one bag: sweatshirt, embroidery kit, dual-sided cosmetics kit, 2 books, swimsuit, shorts, tshirt, brush, phone charger, and small purse. It’s light, but structured, and has lots of pockets. It fits my 13” laptop and my foldable cane along with my essentials.  The zippers are smooth and the fabric is a softer canvas. It seems durable and the color way I got was super cute. I love it!

Received so many compliments on this backpack on a recent flight. So stylish. It has so many handy pockets and I love how the zip on top opens wide for easy access. Enough room to hold my iPad, kindle, cords, travel books and snacks. Also, pockets for water bottles. I would buy it again.

I purchased this as a bag to carry when traveling. It is much larger than expected. The interior pockets are roomy and it is very stylish. I get compliments every time I use it. Definitely worth the price and I am very pleased with my purchase.

评论概述: Metal frame WILL set off bag check scanners at theme parks
评论详情: This is a stylish and roomy day pack, and I loved its many pockets and polished look. The 13 inch size would be perfect for taking to theme parks, concerts, etc. if not for the metal frame - which sets off metal detectors and bag scan machines every time. Even without being loaded with any potentially bag scanner alarming items, such as umbrellas or power bricks, this bag triggered Disney's security line bag scanner nearly every time we went through, requiring us to undergo hand screening at every entry. We finally got wise and left the bag back in our hotel, and never triggered the security scanner after that. An unfortunate downside for what is otherwise a stylish and functional bag!
Love this backpack because it is stylish, nice size and fits laptop well.
Great bag for all the stuff I need and looks very nice!

I love this backpack. It’s not too big and bulky and can carry everything I need. The straps are comfortable and don’t slide off my shoulders. The zippers are great. The organization is great. Build quality is superb.

Very nice purse for the price. Stitching is solid and well made. the only complaint I have is that the top doesn't open up wide enough and the zippers are difficult to open quickly when you need to. Otherwise a great buy.

So happy with this bag. Really roomy and like the handles or backpack carry method. One downside is that it wants to droop over, but that doesn't take any stars away.

I purchased this backpack to use as a carry on for my trips. It works great and it holds my tablet, phone, chargers, water, wallet and so much more. 评论概述: Pretty well made but does not stand up by itself well.

I absolutely love this bag. I needed a small personal bag for flying United economy. This bag fit perfectly under the seat and I cannot stress enough how many pockets it has for storage! It’s very stylish and a great price.  The bag got dirty on my very first use because it was raining and I threw the bag in the bin cream side down. When I returned from my trip I cleaned it per the instructions with a damp wash cloth and a smidge of soap and 95% of the marks came out. I highly recommend this bag!

Bought this for our next vacation coming December. Haven’t used it yet, but I can tell it is good quality. It has a lining inside which gives more protection. Strap is a good length and strength too. Very easy to handle and goes on the luggage handle pretty well with the strap on the back. Love the amount of pockets it has. More pockets-more storage. It is light weight enough that putting a lot of stuff in it will not be a hassle.

I traveled to Flordia, with my carryon and this bag, I had easy access to my phone for tickets, the bag carried my phone, I'd and my Kindle.  Some snacks  and a drinkI also carried a drink a book, and a sweatshirt

The top of this bag has bones along the zipper which makes it hard to close if it is overfilled. Most backpacks you can zip it closed by just getting the stress off the zipper. This one is angled towards the top and will not code unless you fold the closure before zipping. Very cumbersome because you need 2 hands to close and also need to squeeze closure shut. It’s also white and it got dirty very quickly.

I bought this to use as a med bag for supplies I need.  I am a spoonie.  I love this bag.  Amazing.  It hold so many items and has so many pockets and zippers. An it’s not “heavy” when you ill it so it’s easy to carry
It is just the right size to fit all my Disney needs. It is comfortable and opens wide to see and find everything packed.

I purchased the navy and beige "mini" backpack.  The beige is an extremely light shade of beige, more of a cream color.  It's a really nice looking bag and has an expensive look to it with the gold accents, which I love.  There are lots of pockets and the top opening is convenient.  The quality is excellent, inside and out and the striped interior,  silk like lining is a nice touch.  I especially love the back belt to slide over the luggage handle to give your back a break.  The inside and outside bottle pockets are also nice and roomy for larger bottles.  I'd say the 13" is more of a midsized bag as opposed to a mini.  I watched several tiktok videos on the brand and it appears that people love all of their products.  I also love that this bag is very easy to clean, just wipe it down with a damp cloth.  The large storage bag that comes with it is also nice.  I highly recommend this backpack.
The sticking is very secure and there are so many pockets. I absolutely love my bag!

This bag is so cute for the price. I love the style. Has lots of pockets inside to stay organized. I am using it as a downgrade from my bigger diaperbag since my son doesn't need that much stuff anymore. The outside pocket also fits a toddler water bottle.

This bag is so great! I bought it for our new puppy to carry her necessities when we go out. It's roomy and has so many great compartments. I bought myself the larger size to use for a work bag because I love this bag so much plus it's SUPER CUTE!

评论概述: looks cute and small but very spacious
评论详情: I was looking for a backpack that is big enough for travel with my laptop but yet looks small. Not a big choice of those! This one is perfect size, it can be used for traveling w/o a carry-on bag yet with your computer, snacks, water bottle, and a sweater. And it looks very nice.

I have been using this for my crochet and knitting and am loving it! It’s the perfect size for a caked skein of yarn to sit in the bottom and my folded project to sit on top. I can also pop my wallet and phone on the front pocket, a water bottle in the side pocket and my iPad or kindle in the pocket inside the main compartment. Overall, this was an excellent order and I’m glad I was able to get it! I’m looking forward to using this more and more in the future!

This backpack honestly looks like a diaper style backpack. I would not call this a "mini" as it is more of a standard in my personal opinion. Like other LOVEVOOK items, this one is just like the others with the included care card that this backpack cannot be washed. The backpack is cute, however I did notice the lack of organization compared to other LOVEVOOK backpacks I've owned. I recommend it to anyone who needs a new backpack in their life.

I have bought so many different travel backpacks and it looks like I finally have the perfect one.  I bought the 13" because that meets my airlines measurements for a personal item, but there is still tons of room and organization for my on board needs.  I also like the large carry handle so I can slip it over my arm if I don't want to put it on my back.  The luggage strap at the back is also perfect for popping on the handle of my carry-on through the airport....got it on sale too which makes it an amazing buy.  Very happy.
